page.title: 20 SMALL BUSINESSES
page.content: THERE ARE SEVERAL SMALL BUSINESSES IN THE AREA,PROVIDING A WIDE RANGE OF SERVICES.SOME CATER FOR SPECIFIC LOCAL NEEDS:-A SMALL PRINTERS,A SIGNWRITING FIRM AND A GARDEN CENTRE.CAR PARKING DOES NOT SEEM TO BE A PROBLEM AS SEVERAL HAVE THEIR OWN FACILITIES.THEIR CENTRAL LOCATIONS PROVIDE THEM WITH WIDE ACCESS TO THE PUBLIC.SUCH BUSINESSES ARE ON A VERY SMALL SCALE BUT ARE WELL ESTABLISHED. THE MAIN SMALL BUSINESS IS BED AND BREAKFAST USING LARGE OLDER HOUSES PARTICULARLY ON THE EVESHAM AND GROVE ROADS.MOST HOUSES PROVIDE TV LOUNGES, BEDROOMS AND PRIVATE BATHROOMS.SOME SERVE A HOT EVENING MEAL AND ALSO CON- TINENTAL OR ENGLISH BREAKFASTS,FOR ABOUT 10 POUNDS PER NIGHT.THEY ARE USUALLY FAMILY-RUN.THE CUSTOMERS ARE MAINLY AMERICAN AND BRITISH TOURISTS AND STAY FOR SHORT PERIODS.
